body: I'm not a fan of femboys but this stuff is great
Feels like some kind of Eldritch horror story, I dig it.
Huh ig I have problems cuz I like this..
wait, this isn’t a wholesome otokonoko story!
Cosmic horror rape trap hentai. We're evolving to the point we don't need a god anymore, we'd just shame him with weird shit like this until it gave up on us

damn ok just read all of nryotarou work and i... its pretty good the art is nice though theres too much text covering it and the stories are quite peculiar i think they would be better writing a psychological horror manga really weird but good story and plot 10.8/10
@Deckster1218 oh yes, I'm a big fan of his work!
@LewdAndLazy you like body horror? You should read some of Junji Ito's manga then 😁👌🏾

Wasn't expecting some strange body horror, but I ain't complaining. But yeah, for the people confused about the storyline...The "old man" seems to actually be some sort of creature (you can see it's full faceless true-form beginning on pg 21) that lures victims into it's bookshop with the promise of being able to give them a big dick. From there, it fucks them senseless and transforms them into mindless onaholes (like the one that first milks the shota boy at the beginning). But the dialogue of tne the creature at the end was actually pretty good, would like to see actual horror manga from this artist.
I like how squish the boy's body are
My pp hard, then large, then small, then I cease to exist.

I dont understand the lore too much, but what I can glean is that the thing that made the small dick expand was once a human, and the one getting fucked will be turned into one of those dick expanding things at the end of this "transformation". That is the extent of my knowledge of this book, and I could be wrong. Nothing is really stated clearly in the book itself.
.......I'm....I'm not sure how to feel anymore... 6/15

This shit is really degenerate and downright odd, but hey I nutted so whatever.

Also the lore makes about as much sense as the stomach anatomy
